languages.text: [Наставить оружие на незваного гостя] "Если что-то выглядит как покушение и пахнет как покушение... Не пора ли мне отнестись к этому, как к покушению?"

traits.locale_text: [Наставить оружие на незванного гостя] "Если что-то выглядит как покушение и пахнет как покушение... Не пора ли мне отнестись к этому, как к покушению?"

languages.text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

languages.text: [侵入者に武器を向ける]「暗殺らしき事態になったからには…おそらく、暗殺に対処するように動くべきだな？」
languages.original_text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

traits.locale_text: [侵入者に武器を向ける]「暗殺らしき事態になったからには…おそらく、暗殺に対処するように動くべきだな？」

languages.text: [将武器对准入侵者]“既然这件事情左看右看，都像是场蓄谋已久的刺杀行动……不如我就把你当成刺客处理掉吧？”
languages.original_text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

traits.locale_text: [将武器对准入侵者]“既然这件事情左看右看，都像是场蓄谋已久的刺杀行动……不如我就把你当成刺客处理掉吧？”

languages.text: [Apuntar con tu arma al intruso] «Si algo parece un asesinato y huele a asesinato... tal vez sea hora de tratarlo como tal».
languages.original_text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

traits.locale_text: [Apuntar con tu arma al intruso] «Si algo parece un asesinato y huele a asesinato... tal vez sea hora de tratarlo como tal».

languages.text: [Braquer votre arme sur l'intrus] « Si ça ressemble à un assassinat et que ça en a l'odeur... alors il vaut sans doute mieux que j'agisse comme si c'en était un. »
languages.original_text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

traits.locale_text: [Braquer votre arme sur l'intrus] « Si ça ressemble à un assassinat et que ça en a l'odeur... alors il vaut sans doute mieux que j'agisse comme si c'en était un. »

languages.text: [Deine Waffe auf den Eindringling richten] "Wenn etwas nach einem Attentat aussieht und sich auch so anfühlt ... vielleicht sollte ich dann entsprechend damit umgehen."
languages.original_text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

traits.locale_text: [Deine Waffe auf den Eindringling richten] "Wenn etwas nach einem Attentat aussieht und sich auch so anfühlt ... vielleicht sollte ich dann entsprechend damit umgehen."

languages.text: [Silahını davetsiz misafire doğrult] "Bir şey suikast gibi görünüyor ve suikast gibi kokuyorsa o şeye suikastmış gibi yaklaşmam gerekmez mi?"
languages.original_text: [Aim your weapon at the intruder] "If something looks like an assassination and smells like an assassination... perhaps I ought to start treating it like one?"

traits.locale_text: [Silahını davetsiz misafire doğrult] "Bir şeyler suikast gibi görünüyorsa ve suikast gibi kokuyorsa, belki de o şeye suikastmış gibi yaklaşmam gerekir?"
